title: Bratolyubovskii Kurgan
description: A Scythian burial mound dated to the fourth century B.C. located near the village of Bratolyubivka in Kherson Oblast, Ukraine.

properties.description: Point representing the approximate Google Earth location of Bratolyubovskii Kurgan.
properties.title: Approximate imagery location of Bratolyubovskii Kurgan
